metadata.synopsis: Plig roars this warning at the player who is in prison and has got too close to the doors.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Player, while in prison, has approached the cell door while the warrior plig is nearby

0.speaker: Warrior Plig
0.text: Oi, barrel-rat! Back away from the bars or I bite off one of 'em fingers!
0.context: NodeContext: Roaring with both anger and delight (she kind wants the player to start some shit as she's eager for action.)
